subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: Chris Froome, the defending champion, sustained injuries to his thigh, wrist and hand in a spill in Stage 4 as the Tour de France returned home from England on Tuesday.
snippet: Chris Froome, the defending champion, sustained injuries to his thigh, wrist and hand in a spill in Stage 4 as the Tour de France returned home from England on Tuesday.
